example.para: An example of building a Windows Forms application using the prefix attribute of the resources file set to prefix .resx files.
example.code: <project> <csc target="winexe" output="About.exe" debug="false"> <sources> <includes name="AboutForm.cs"/> </sources> <resources prefix="About"> <includes name="AboutForm.resx"/> <includes name="App.ico"/> </resources> <references> <includes name="System.dll" asis="true"/> <includes name="System.Data.dll" asis="true"/> <includes name="System.Xml.dll" asis="true"/> <includes name="System.Windows.Forms.dll" asis="true"/> <includes name="System.Drawing.dll" asis="true"/> </references> </csc> </project>
